title: DataSaver and Wifi Calling - Other person cannot hear me/I can hear other person
content:
Hi,
I have a Pixel 3 w/ Google Fi Service and I am having issues with WiFi calling and DataSaver. When DataSaver is on the other person on the phone cannot hear me but I can hear them fine. When searching I found this post (https://www.reddit.com/r/GooglePixel/comments/7odvgg/wifi_calling_issueresolved/dsa4dvu/) saying it is a known issue.
Is there any way to keep data saver on and also use Wifi calling?
I made sure that the phone application is allowed to use background data and also unrestricted data usage. I'm not sure what else I can do.
Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated.

**Note as soon as I disabled Wi-Fi Calling the phone is working normally.

Thanks
